appsgate.lig.weather
Interface WeatherForecast

All Known Implementing Classes:
YahooWeatherImpl
public interface WeatherForecast

Interface for weather forecast service

Author:
jnascimento

Nested Class Summary
static class WeatherForecast.Unit
          Units defined for Weather Conditions EU for European (temperature °C, distance km, pressure mb, speed km/h) - Metric format US for English (temperature °F, distance mi, pressure in, speed mph)

Method Detail

setLocation

void setLocation(java.lang.String placeName)
                 throws WeatherForecastException
Try to resolve the place with an human friendly name

Parameters:
placeName - A human place name (a town, a country, a particular place)
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - If place name in incorrect, misspelled or cannot be found

setUnit

void setUnit(WeatherForecast.Unit unit)
Parameters:
unit - US or EU

getUnit

WeatherForecast.Unit getUnit()
Returns:
the currently defined unit (EU by default)

getCurrentLocation

java.lang.String getCurrentLocation()
                                    throws WeatherForecastException
Returns:
The current defined location for Weather Forecast (Human Readable), by default location is set to Grenoble
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch

getCurrentTemperature

int getCurrentTemperature()
                          throws WeatherForecastException
Returns:
The current temperature (accordingly to current temperature unit °C or °F)
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch

getCurrentWeatherCode

int getCurrentWeatherCode()
                          throws WeatherForecastException
Returns:
The code describing current weather condition
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch
See Also:
WeatherCodesHelper

getCurrentWindSpeed

float getCurrentWindSpeed()
                          throws WeatherForecastException
Returns:
The current wind speed (accordingly to current unit mph or km/h)
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch

getCurrentWindDirection

int getCurrentWindDirection()
                            throws WeatherForecastException
Returns:
The current wind direction (in degree)
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch

getForecast

java.util.List<DayForecast> getForecast()
                                        throws WeatherForecastException
Returns:
The Forecast for the next days (number of days might vary), including min and max temperature weather code
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch

getPublicationDate

java.util.Calendar getPublicationDate()
                                      throws WeatherForecastException
Returns:
The Date at which weather forecast data were initially published (do not confuse with getLastFetch date)
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if no weather forecast have been fetch

getLastFetch

java.util.Calendar getLastFetch()
Returns:
The Date at which the Weather web-service was requested for the last time or null if no data been fetched

fetch

WeatherForecast fetch()
                      throws WeatherForecastException
Try to connect to a weather web-service and fetch the latest weather forecast

Returns:
a forecast object
Throws:
WeatherForecastException - if impossible to retrieve weather forecast (web-service unavailable, ...)
